title: Eltharon (Part 1)
body:
Eltharon (Part 1)

Boom!

With a booming sound, a powerful aura erupted from Evan's body and his Monarch Core turned completely solid.

(Your Monarch Core Successfully Evolved Into The Primordial Monarch Core)

(You have acquired 'The Heart Of Origin')

(Your title Master Of The Shadow Realm has evolved into 'The Creator Of The Primordial Shadow Realm')

(Your shadow energy has evolved into 'Primordial Shadow Energy')

(The effect of your Title - - - -)

(------)

(------)

As soon as Evan's core was completely solidified, many notifications flashed in front of his retina, but he did not have time to see them because the moment his core was completely solidified, an immeasurable force surged inside him and started to refine his body.
